fullplot: On the night of an astronomical anomaly, eight friends at a dinner party experience a troubling chain of reality bending events.
plot: Strange things begin to happen when a group of friends gather for a dinner party on an evening when a comet is passing overhead.
title: Coherence

tomatoes.consensus: A case study in less-is-more filmmaking, Coherence serves as a compelling low-budget calling card for debuting writer-director James Ward Byrkit.
